article: Here are my three photos . This is my friend , Wu Huan . She is a good girl . She is 11 years old . She is in Chongqing with her family . She likes vegetables and chicken . She does n ' t like ice cream or strawberries . This is me . My name is Chen Ming . I am 12 years old . I am a middle school student in Suzhou . I like eating fruit and vegetables . But I do n ' t like eggs or carrots . This is my friend , too . His name is Doudou . He is in Suzhou with me . He likes bones ( ) . He does n ' t like vegetables . He likes playing with balls . He is a nice dog ! :

model: wu huan is a middle school student in suzhou
chen ming and wu huan like vegetables
human: Doudou is Wu Huan ' s friend .
